name: Subject 13 (itch)
description:
Update 27DEC2021 -

Fixed a sorting issue causing some graphical bugs.

Update 26DEC2021 -

Fixed an issue with tile colliders, and an issue where challenges could be loaded after walking away from them. Thanks to my nephews for discovering them! Original submission available as a download.

Controls -

WASD for Movement

Left Click to start challenges

Right Click to unleash energy

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome! Subject 13 was made for Mini Jam 96 with the theme of FATE, and the limitation of LOSING IS GOOD!

In this game, the player must finish - or bypass - challenges. When losing, the player will build up energy which can be unleashed to destroy obstacles.

Feedback always welcome, and thanks for playing!
